title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: December 02, 2023, 02:59:52 PMLast edit: July 16, 2024, 07:23:53 AM by cygan
content: Dear customers, Just in time for the 1st advent, we are pleased to present you our latest release : the Timeline card November editionThrough this edition we aim to keep a tangible record of the evolution of Bitcoin. Each card of this edition will have a BTC face value equivalent to 50‚Ç¨ (0.00152597BTC for this edition), allowing you to track the progress of this magic internet moneyThis edition is also an opportunity for artists in the crypto community to express themselves and share their vision of the crypto universe. Every quarter, we will collaborate with a different artist, offering a diversity of styles and perspectives over time.Each month during the quarter, a new design from this artist will be featured on a series of cards, making each edition limited and collectible. The Timeline edition will be buyer funded. You can load your card if you want to. This November edition is also the very first to represent our new Icarus hologramFor this first quarter (Q4/2023), the supply will be 42 cards per month. In addition to that, 1 artist proof card will be produced per design, and offered to the artist. We reserve the right to modify and adjust the supply for next quarters, if we see that too many people are not able to get a card. This quarter, we have the pleasure to work with mx12.levins and release the second Timeline card edition for Q4 November 2023.Icarus Timeline Edition 11/2023 (designed by comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: #42 aoluainThis edition looks great, well done cygan and mx12.levins, I was wondering for the lastweek or two when this edition was going to launch.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Cygan....looks good! Please give me number one as always!¬† Cheers!

comments.body: can I move from 76 to 10 for the timeline series? especially since it is doubtful that there will be 76? I have the last one in #10

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Congratulations to this Card including the new Holos. Got the chance to watch it in detail. Well doneüí™

comments.author: thiago007
comments.created_time: December 06, 2023, 12:40:20 PMLast edit: December 06, 2023, 12:58:59 PM by thiago007
comments.body: Can make a small suggestion if you can use another form of payment such as Litecoin or Lightning Payment, doing it on the bitcoin chain the fees are ridiculous.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on December 06, 2023, 12:40:20 PMCan make a small suggestion if you can use another form of payment such as Litecoin or Lightning Payment, doing it on the bitcoin chain the fees are ridiculous.we would like to provide you with a lightning option.can anyone tell us a good ln option that we could offer our customers as an alternative for their next orders?

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Phoenix is one way to go, and Breeze is also an option. Walletofsatoshi is one of the simplest wallets, but I won't hodl a lot of satoshis here because, you never know. I haven't had any issues with it so far. I did hear a lot about Lnbits, people are saying this is also a way to go, but I don't think it's the simplest way.

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: This card looks great. I would like to add #9 to my collection as previously reserved. After seeing the October card in person I would also like to pick up a second subscription if that is possible. I would be happy with any number and will gladly send payment for October and November as well. #18 would be great if it is not already reserved, otherwise any set is great. I am really glad to see this series start off. Looking forward to the cards in 2024!Thanks Geophphreigh
